tagline: Climate-smart garden planning that matches your site, your time, and your soil
pros: Zone-specific plant selection eliminates common failures
Designs for actual time commitment, not fantasy
Soil-first approach builds long-term garden health
cons: Operates on nature's timeline — not fast results
Doesn't handle hardscaping or major landscape construction
Regional expertise varies — needs location context to be effective

model_recommendations.notes: Template-following, scheduling, tracking, simple Q&A. Lightweight models save cost without sacrificing quality for these structured tasks.
